70010000085856.description:
Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions is a fast-paced racing game for the whole family that brings the famous Europa-Park mascots Ed & Edda to life for the first time in a video game to coincide with the worldwide release of the animated feature film ‘GRAND PRIX OF EUROPE’!

You can race with the two heroes or six other colourful characters that fans of the film will recognise! The races take players to various well-known locations across Europe to compete in Free Races, the Points Chase, Time trial or the Grand Prix!

Each character not only has their very own racing car, but also individual strengths and weaknesses, which means that each race can be driven very differently depending on which character you take to the track!

But Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions is not just a game that is great fun to play alone: in a race with two, three or even four players, every family and every group of friends can create their very own memories in the world of the Racing Champions - because with Ed & Edda, too, it's true: a shared game is often twice the fun!

 
Key features of Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions:

Race over exciting tracks in many world-famous European locations

Choose between eight well-known characters, including Ed & Edda, the legendary Europa-Park mascots

Unleash unique driving skills, master power-ups and customise your race car to make every race feel unique

Long-term modifications to the racing car and unlockable improvements keep the replay value high

A split-screen mode for local multiplayer races of 2 to 4 players invites families to have fun together and create their very own memories in the world of Ed & Edda.
70010000085856.name: Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX – Racing Champions

70010000089529.description:
Acrana Famiglia is an autonomous organization that protects the small island of Regalo in the Mediterranean Sea. 
Those who belong to the Famiglia have a mysterious power called Arcana, which they use to protect the island from outside enenmies. 
Felicita (main character/name can be changed), the only daughter of the organization's boss Mondo, has only just taken her first steps as a member of the family.
April 1st. It's Mondo's birthday. At a party thrown for him by the family, he makes a surprising announcement.

Mondo: "Two months from now...June 1. We'll hold the Arcana Duello!"
Mondo: "The winner of the Duello will become the leader of the organization...and as the new Papa, they will wed my daughter."

This is Felicita's story, as she fights to win the Arcana Duello in order to change her own destiny.

Felicita: "My path...is for me to decide."

・"Arcana Famiglia -La storia della Arcana Famiglia- Ancora", a game based on the concept of a Otome game × Shonen manga, originally available in 2015, will be ported to the Nintendo Switch™!

・The game progresses with a comic-like storyline that uses colorful illustrations called the Comiaru system. The game also features the unique Cocoaru System, which allows you to read the minds of other characters!

・Enjoy character designer and original artist Yomi Sarachi's beautiful CG illustrations in full HD quality!
The story is brought to life by a talented cast of voice actors including Jun Fukuyama, Tsubasa Yonaga, Hiroyuki Yoshino, Tomokazu Sugita, Yuichi Nakamura, Jurota Kosugi, and Koji Yusa.
70010000089529.intro: This is a story of destiny and bonds centered around Felicita, the daughter of the boss of Arcana Famiglia.
70010000089529.name: Arcana Famiglia Rinato

70010000092569.description:
★ WELCOME TO TRANSPORTER ★
A solo platform racing game, technical and competitive.

★ THE CONCEPT:
Choose from 3 vehicle types: Classic, Amphibious, or Military.
Your mission: deliver your cargo while avoiding obstacles, and cross the finish line with at least one item intact.

★ TECHNICAL GAMEPLAY:
Choose the right vehicle
Adjust your speed
Maintain your balance
Analyze the terrain and overcome obstacles

★ AVAILABLE WORLDS:
Indy Jungle – ideal for 4x4 vehicles
Operation Overlord – combat-focused, perfect for military vehicles

★ VEHICLES:
Unlock 19 unique vehicles
• Classic (versatile)
• Amphibious (fast on water)
• Military (armored, can shoot)

★ GARAGE:
Tune 5 parameters: power, suspension, grip, brakes, fuel tank
Special upgrades: armor, handling, electromagnetism, and more

★ CARGO:
Unlock 11 types of cargo to deliver.

★ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS:
Compare your scores with other players in each race via online rankings.
70010000092569.intro:
★ Drive. Master. Deliver. ★
Race against time to transport goods across various environment.
70010000092569.name: Transporter

70010000093151.description:
Game Features:
A short story fusing romance, school life, thriller, and magical realism (approx. 2 hours playtime, multiple endings)
Psychedelic and vibrant neo-flat illustration art style depicting a surreal world
Dreamlike yet eerie original soundtrack with immersive sound design
Synopsis:
As an 18-year-old student at a magical boarding school, "I" made a fateful decision: to trade my heart to a witch in an occult ritual.
The witch's ritual granted all my desires – adoring crowds, unprecedented status, and a grand romance. But the crowds turned faceless, power became a viper's nest, and love... How could I possibly respond to his affection... when I had no heart left to feel?
70010000093151.intro: To gain the love of all people, would you dedicate your own heart?
70010000093151.name: Zero-Sum Heart

70010000096192.description:
Past a Trail of Delusions
and Roger is an interactive novel that lets you see through the protagonist's eyes—whether what she sees makes sense or not. It is comprised of three chapters and can be played in its entirety in about one hour.

Story
It's just another morning for this young girl. She wakes up and starts getting herself ready while shaking off the sleepiness like always. Except something, somehow, feels off.

When she steps into the living room, she expects to find her dad preparing for work. Instead, she finds a stranger sleeping on the couch.
The man wakes up, looks at the girl, and sighs. Ignoring her confusion, he mumbles to himself with a hint of sadness in his voice.

It's really time to get ready.

Scared, the girl runs. She must leave the house.
"She doesn't know who this man is or where her father has gone.

Walk alongside her on this twisting, twisted path and see where it will lead her."
70010000096192.intro: It was a morning like all others until she realized her dad wasn't home. In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she takes her medicine. Who is he?
70010000096192.name: and Roger

70010000096336.description:
Welcome to Tiny Titans – Card Rumble, where epic RPG battles meet adorable chibi charm! Step into a world of fast-paced strategy and build your ultimate deck of tiny heroes, each with unique powers and big personalities. Whether you prefer knights, mages, healers, or rogues—there’s a Titan for every playstyle.
Engage in exciting card-based battles on a 3x3 board, placing heroes that attack, heal, or unleash powerful effects the moment they’re played. Once activated, they stay on the field, holding the line with their defense stats as the rumble continues. Outmaneuver your foes with clever tactics, unleash combos, and turn the tide with the perfect placement.
Open boosters to collect new heroes, level up your favorites by merging, and craft the perfect strategy in the deck-building menu. Unlock new arenas across magical worlds that change how you play. Whether you're a tactical mastermind or just love cute chibi chaos, Tiny Titans – Card Rumble delivers epic fun in tiny form!
70010000096336.intro: Exciting epic chibi heroes and fast, tactical card battles!
70010000096336.name: Tiny Titans - Card Rumble

70010000097924.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Uiwang-si (City), Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000097924.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Uiwang-si

70010000098552.description:
SOMA is a horror and science fiction video game from Frictional Games, the creators of Amnesia: the Dark Descent. It is a haunting story about identity, consciousness and what it means to be human.

The radio doesn't work, food is scarce and machines have begun to believe they are people. The submerged PATHOS-II facility has suffered terrible isolation and difficult decisions will have to be made. What to do? What makes sense? What is left to fight for?

Enter the world of SOMA and confront the horrors submerged in the depths of the ocean. Rummage through locked terminals and secret documents to uncover the truth behind the chaos. Search for the last inhabitants and take part in the events that will ultimately shape the fate of the station. But beware, danger lurks around every corner: corrupt humans, twisted creatures, mad robots and even an inscrutable and omnipresent A.I..
You'll need to figure out how to deal with each one. Just remember there's no turning back, either you defeat your enemies or get ready to run.
70010000098552.intro: A masterpiece of psychological horror. Fight to survive in a hostile world that will make you question your own existence.
70010000098552.name: SOMA

70010000098786.description:
The objective is quite simple: each level contains numerous uncoloured pixels, and it is your job to colour them in. Each pixel is numbered; this number corresponds to a colour in your palette. Select a colour from the palette and paint each of its corresponding pixels. Correctly colour all pixels in a level to finish it!

Coloring Pixels is a great way to wind down, you can just sit back and relax. With 180 levels, you can have hours of fun. This collection contains 8 themed books:

Celtic Book - Patterns, traditions, and so much more! Explore the history of the Celtic people with this historical pack!

Isometric 3 Book - The third book of its kind offers various images and scenes, all designed in the isometric perspective!

Jungle Book - Images are of the wonderful wildlife you can only find in the jungles of our world! Get ready to explore and discover what wonders are hidden inside the dense underbrush of the Jungle!

Machines Book - Cogs and Gears and Pistons, oh my! Covering images of all kinds of machines and moving parts!

Microscopic Book - Images are things under the microscope! Put on your lab coat and discover what things look like up close!

Oceania Book - Images are of the amazing cultures from down under! Check out this whole ocean-based continent in pixel art!

Pets Book - Dogs, Cats, Lizards and more! Using inspiration from some real-life pets submitted by our players, deciding which is the most adorable is impossible!

Vistas 3 Book - The third of its kind, this DLC offers even more of the scenery, landscapes, and forests you love!
70010000098786.intro: A relaxing coloring-by-numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.
70010000098786.name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 6

70010000099225.description:
There's no time to think! You just have to run for your life! Every second counts, so it's important to keep up the pace.

Stay alert and wait for the right moment to change direction, so you can keep running. Use your brain to avoid the danger. The Giant never stops - it's his goal to smash you! You can win — use different tactics for the various situations you encounter. Take the risk and escape the Giant! 

Seize your opportunity and try to survive this deadly race — run fast and avoid the obstacles. Show no fear! Running is the only option. 

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Run, boy, run! You can do it!
70010000099225.intro: Run for your life and never look back!
70010000099225.name: Giant Flee

70010000099357.description:
Let's make choco bananas on the Nintendo Switch™!
Dip each banana in chocolate and add a topping, making choco bananas to order!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make choco bananas to order!
Dip bananas in chocolate, decorate them with tasty toppings, and serve them up!
Make as many as you can before time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Prepare a banana and skewer it on a stick!

2. Dip the banana in chocolate! Choose from choco, matcha, strawberry and mint flavors!

3. When the chocolate has set, add a topping! Choose from sprinkles, sugar balls, and choco sauce!

4. When the chocolate has hardened, serve the choco banana!

[Score Attack]
Whip up as many choco bananas as possible and aim for the top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Compete with others and test your choco banana-making skills!
70010000099357.intro:
It's time for a cute choco banana-making challenge!
Make as many as you can, and watch your food cart prosper!
70010000099357.name: Make it! Choco Banana

70010000099648.description:
They said it was just a meme. A shout that echoed through the pre-dawn streets: “Tung tung tung… SAHUR!” Legend says if you hear the call three times and don’t respond… it will come for you.

Welcome to Tung Tung Tung Sahur REPORT, an online horror game where the cheerful call to eat before sunrise has become a haunting reminder of what was lost. You’re a scavenger, dropped into the cursed remains of a forgotten world, tasked with recovering valuable relics using your trusty physics-grabbing tool. Just one problem: you’re not alone.

Echoes follow you. Shadows move when they shouldn’t. And somewhere in the darkness, the tung tung tung is getting louder.

Search. Grab. Extract. Survive. The deeper you go, the weirder it gets—and the more the line blurs between meme and myth. Will you collect the lost pieces of civilization, or will you end up another late sleeper who didn’t answer the call?
70010000099648.name: Tung Tung Tung Sahur REPORT

70010000099843.description:
Noah's Dilemma is a crew-building strategy roguelike set in a reinvented mythology of Noah's Ark inspired by Magical Realism, featuring unique placement-centric gameplay inspired by sudoku and autochess.

■ Playtime
A successful run typically takes around 2 to 5 hours to complete, with 5 to 10 attempts expected before beating the game for the first time.

■ Build Your Animal Crew
Embark on a journey to gather animals who will also serve as your sailors. Harness their abilities, ignite synergies, and turn your ark into a swift vessel.

■ Explore Wild Islands
Sail through a procedurally generated map, venturing to untamed islands filled with hidden treasures, hot springs, altars, villages, and more.

■ Battle the Coral-Born
The Coral-Born are hostile creatures that emerged after the Great Flood. Command your animal crew to defend the ark from their relentless assaults.

■ Conquer the Four Seas
Each of the Four Seas is ruled by a formidable boss. Defeat them all, bring every animal onboard to the promised land, and claim your title as the conqueror of the Four Seas.

■ More Challenges Await
After victory, unlock 2 new playable characters, face 6 tougher quests, and activate a 10-level challenge mode designed for veteran players.

■ Play First, Lore Later
Noah’s Dilemma emphasizes gameplay first, presenting its story in a minimalist style. Still, every element in the game is carefully crafted to fit into a rich, coherent world, leaving room for lore-seekers to uncover its deeper mysteries.

■ Features
- Four sea areas to conquer, each with its own traits and governing boss.
- Three playable characters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.
- 50+ creatures, ranging from familiar mammals to deep-sea inhabitants.
- 50+ encounters and events randomly woven into your adventure.
- 50+ animal natures and abnormalities to trigger risks and thrills.
- 50+ animal effects with abundant variations and synergies.
- 150+ items and relics designed for strategic play.
- 1 core mission, 6 extra quests and a 10-level challenge mode.
- A fresh and engaging 10-hour experience for all players, with many more hours for those looking to complete the game and master every detail.
70010000099843.name: Noah's Dilemma

70010000101679.description:
Sharpen your mind as you search for hidden gems and treasure chests tucked away in everyday scenes.
This picture puzzle game is both relaxing and brain-stimulating — perfect for all ages!

Easy to play：
・Read the clue carefully to see what you're looking for
・Scan the photo to spot the hidden item
・Tap the item before time runs out!

Some objects might seem easy to find at first glance…
but with the clock ticking, it’s more of a challenge than you’d think!

No worries if time runs out — you can try as many times as you like.

Need a hand?
Tap the hint button to get a subtle clue about where to look!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000101679.intro:
Hunt for hidden treasures in each picture!
A fun and brain-boosting item search game for all ages
70010000101679.name: Picture Treasure Hunt

70050000056961.description:
Introducing a brand-new mode for the Super Mario Party™ Jamboree game: Jamboree TV! Exclusive to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition you’ll unlock with this upgrade pack, Jamboree TV casts you and your friends as contestants in a game show hosted by Toad. Take on a variety of challenges along with Mario and friends that use the Joy-Con™ 2* controller for mouse controls, the system's built-in microphone to respond to your sounds, and more. Add a USB-C® camera** accessory (each sold separately) and other players’ faces will appear during gameplay—you’ll get to see your friends get crowned for winning minigames, for example, or surrounded by the coins they’ve won!

Jamboree TV supports higher resolution in both TV and handheld mode, so you can enjoy the world of Mario Party with a higher level of detail. You can also play 78 of the original Super Mario Party Jamboree minigames in Jamboree TV mode to experience them in higher resolution!

Get hands-on with Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive features in Carnival Coaster and Bowser Live

Lock in and go on the co-op Carnival Coaster! Use the Joy-Con 2 controller’s mouse controls to aim at flying baddies and try to blast ‘em down. Work together to improve your score and play a minigame each time the coaster rolls into a pipe.

In Bowser Live, you can get on stage and become the star of the performance! Compete in two teams and take on wild minigame challenges focused on sound and movement. Connect the Nintendo Switch 2 camera accessory or a compatible USB-C® camera to project you and your buddies into the in-game venue!

Chat with family and friends while sharing your screen online using the Nintendo Switch 2 system’s GameChat feature 

Chat using the system's built-in microphone and go on-camera with a compatible USB-C® camera. Some modes even let you put your face in the game along with fun special effects!

Share part of the game with anyone who has a Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch 2 system

If you have the Nintendo Switch 2 system and the Super Mario Party Jamboree – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV game, you can share part of the game with anyone who has a Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch 2 system using GameShare.

With one game, up to four people can play the Mega Wiggler's Tree Party board and 30 minigames in Mario Party mode.***
70050000056961.intro: Enhance your jamboree with better visuals and even more minigames—only on the Nintendo Switch™ 2 system!
70050000056961.name: Super Mario Party™ Jamboree – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition + Jamboree TV Upgrade Pack

70050000059989.description:
Shadows grow thicker, and the line between reality and illusion begins to blur. As you venture through previously unseen areas of the castle, you'll uncover disturbing memories hidden in its walls. 

Paranormal phenomena become increasingly intense, and each decision you make pulls you closer to one of the many story paths, will you find the truth, or be swallowed by the castle’s darkness?
70050000059989.intro: The mystery thickens. Explore new areas of the castle and face even more intense paranormal activity in Chapter 3.
70050000059989.name: Opus Castle - Chapter 3

70050000059990.description:
Chapter 4 invites you into the heart of the castle’s darkest secrets. Time begins to warp, showing the past as if it were the present. Visions of those who lived and died, there become unavoidable. T

he castle begins to reveal its own consciousness, reacting to your presence. Your investigation into the tragedy turns personal, and each ghost you meet has a story to tell or a warning to give.
70050000059990.intro: The castle remembers. In Chapter 4, time and reality twist as spirits reveal personal truths about the tragedy.
70050000059990.name: Opus Castle - Chapter 4

70050000059992.description:
The final chapter of Opus Castle brings all storylines to their conclusion. In this haunting finale, all paths converge, and the castle forces you to face everything you've discovered and everything you've done. 

The spirits are restless, and the truth is no longer just a mystery to solve, but a reckoning. The castle’s fate and your own, rests in the decisions you’ve made. Will you escape, or become another whisper in its haunted halls?
70050000059992.intro: The final reckoning. Chapter 6 delivers the ending your choices shaped. Will you find peace or be trapped forever?
70050000059992.name: Opus Castle - Chapter 6

70010000088024.description:
Iris the internet idol has been abducted by aliens?!
Finding herself on board a mysterious UFO and tasked with completing a bizarre escape game, Iris knows there's one person who she can always count on for help: Kaname Date, Psyncer! 
As Date, conduct investigations, solve escape game puzzles, and Psync into the dreams of potential suspects to help Iris escape and unravel the mystery behind The Third Eye Game!

・ Investigation: Use the special functions in Date's left eye to gather information that will lead to Iris's whereabouts! Familiar and new characters will also appear!
・Somnium: Explore the eccentric dream world of potential suspects to uncover clues and secret memories!
・ Escape: Solve thrilling mysteries while exploring a locked environment. When you find the true answer beyond the surface level of logic, the door to escape will open!
70010000088024.intro: Open Your Third Eye To Seek A Way Out!
70010000088024.name: No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES

70010000093076.description:
Play as Tulock, a snow fox, and help him progress through the different levels of this puzzle game based on movement on a hexagonal grid.

Slide in a straight line to an obstacle or the edge across 100 levels and find the right path to the final hexagon, avoiding the traps.

Discover new mechanics in the various worlds of increasing difficulty without fear of getting stuck, thanks to the help included in the game.

And for those wanting extra difficulty, over 250 optional challenges spread across the levels are present.


Features:
* 100 levels spread over 12 worlds,
* Hexagonal grid requiring different thinking,
* 10 mechanics added as the game progresses,
* Increasing difficulty, with in-game help included (solutions),
* Ability to undo moves if you make a mistake,
* More than 250 optional challenges spread over 100 levels.
70010000093076.intro: Help Tulock reach the final hexagon
70010000093076.name: TERASLIDE

70010000097419.description:
• Fight back against giant nature-infused beasts.
As a hunter, you will face off against beasts that have endured the blazing lava, raging blizzards, and rising miasma plaguing the harsh lands of Azuma. These beasts, known as Kemono, embody the very essence of nature in all its beauty and ferocity. The key to surviving the fight lies in joining forces with comrades and wielding Karakuri technology.

• Develop your hunting grounds using Karakuri technology.
Weaving the threads of Karakuri enables you to instantly create basic items like crates and gliders. You can even combine these items to develop Karakuri like beast-piercing blades, protective shields, and traps to stop movement in real time, all of which can aid you in your battle against the Kemono. There are also some Karakuri that will remain on the field, giving you the freedom to place them in strategic locations and create your own ideal hunting grounds.

• Customize your play experience with diverse combat styles.
The game features a wide range of equipment. From general weapons like the nodachi and bow, to unconventional ones like the karakuri katana and bladed wagasa, each weapon has unique characteristics. By utilizing materials gathered from the hunts to craft new equipment, hunters can persist in their pursuit of beasts. This ongoing cycle enables hunters to grow even stronger and challenge themselves in combat against numerous fearsome Kemono.

• The story and world:
No one remembers why the Kemono began their rampage through a once-prosperous Azuma. Fueled by desperation, they wield the power of primal nature at its most destructive. For a while, it seemed that none could stand against their overwhelming might. But hope arrives in the form of a formidable hunter armed with deadly weapons and ancient technology called Karakuri that could turn the tide of battle.
70010000097419.intro: Hunt giant beasts using a variety of Karakuri tech, now with up to 3 teammates!
70010000097419.name: WILD HEARTS S

70010000097821.description:
Iris the internet idol has been abducted by aliens?!
Finding herself on board a mysterious UFO and tasked with completing a bizarre escape game, Iris knows there's one person who she can always count on for help: Kaname Date, Psyncer! 
As Date, conduct investigations, solve escape game puzzles, and Psync into the dreams of potential suspects to help Iris escape and unravel the mystery behind The Third Eye Game!

・ Investigation: Use the special functions in Date's left eye to gather information that will lead to Iris's whereabouts! Familiar and new characters will also appear!
・Somnium: Explore the eccentric dream world of potential suspects to uncover clues and secret memories!
・ Escape: Solve thrilling mysteries while exploring a locked environment. When you find the true answer beyond the surface level of logic, the door to escape will open!
70010000097821.intro: Open Your Third Eye To Seek A Way Out!
70010000097821.name: No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES

70010000098805.description:
Embark on a thrilling journey with Motel Owner Simulator, where you become a savvy motel manager! Take control of every detail, from designing inviting rooms to running a successful hospitality business. Decorate interiors, rent out rooms, expand your property, and maximize profits. Develop marketing strategies to attract diverse guests and meet their needs with excellent service.

• Design interiors: Choose styles, colors, and decorations to create a unique atmosphere in rooms and common areas that impress guests.
• Master business skills: Set room prices, manage expenses, and optimize revenue while running effective marketing campaigns.
• Expand quickly: Grow your motel by adding floors and facilities like restaurants or spas to meet rising demand.
• Cater to all guests: From families to tourists and business travelers, provide personalized service to ensure a memorable stay.

Manage your budget wisely, invest strategically, and face economic challenges with confidence. Compete with other motels, listen to feedback, and improve continuously to become the top choice in the region!
70010000098805.name: Motel Owner Simulator

70010000100355.description:
Pro Craps – Real Casino Action at Your Fingertips

Experience the excitement of the craps table with Pro Craps, a fully interactive game built for touchscreen play. Featuring real-time dice physics, full craps rules, and high-end 3D visuals, this game brings the energy and strategy of a real casino into the palm of your hand.

Features:
– Realistic dice physics for authentic roll outcomes
– Full implementation of standard craps rules and bet types
– High-quality 3D assets for tables, dice, chips, and more
– Dynamic win animations and smooth visual feedback
– Immersive music and sound effects that react to the action

Whether you're a longtime player or just learning the ropes, Pro Craps delivers a polished, responsive, and deeply engaging craps experience designed specifically for touchscreen consoles.

Roll the dice, manage your bets, and chase the thrill—just like the real thing
70010000100355.name: Pro Craps

70010000101217.description:
Psychopathy Assessment is a retro-90s V.H.S style analog horror game that blurs the line between reality and delusion. Step into a universe where you're not just playing a game; you're taking a psychopathy test, but the stakes are considerably higher than a straightforward diagnosis.

Answer a series of questions designed to probe your deepest thoughts and impulses.

Every choice has consequences, each more unsettling than the last, as the screen flickers and the tape warps under the weight of your decisions.

Are you ready to find out if you're truly a psychopath? Or will the test itself drive you to madness? The only way to know is to press play.

Features:

-Psychopathy Test: Respond to a series of frightening and penetrating questions intended to delve into your psyche. Will the results show something sinister, or is this just a game?

-Dynamic Consequences: Each decision has an impact on the atmosphere and your final ending, guaranteeing that no two playthroughs are identical.

-Immersive VHS Filter: Play via a distorted lens, complete with realistic VHS effects, tape errors, and visual distortions that worsen as you advance.

-Psychological Horror: A story that plays with your mind, questioning your perspective of reality and blurring the borders between fiction and truth.

-Multiple Endings: Discover various outcomes based on your decisions throughout the assessment. Each ending provides a fresh viewpoint on your results.
70010000101217.name: Psychopathy Assessment

70010000082527.description:
Dive into a fast and fun adventure with Rubber Duck Race Simulator! Choose your favorite duck, launch it into the water, and race against other competitors through raging rivers, spectacular waterfalls, and surprising tracks.

What awaits you?
- Dynamic tracks – Shifting currents, surprise obstacles, and hidden ramps that make every race unique.
- Daily challenges – Complete quick missions for exclusive rewards.
- Endless race mode – An infinite stream of procedurally generated tracks that grow more challenging.
- Variety of ducks – Unlock a diverse range of ducks, each with its own unique style and special abilities.

Get ready for limitless fun, show off your reflexes, and prove that your duck is the fastest on the water! Are you ready to make waves and be the first to cross the finish line?
70010000082527.intro: Get your duck ready for the ultimate race!
70010000082527.name: Rubber Duck Race Simulator

70010000102367.description:
Welcome to Sunberry Valley – a peaceful experience where nature tells the story & the wind blows.

Step into the golden sunlight of Sunberry Valley, a tranquil open-world experience designed for quiet exploration and gentle discovery. Stroll through sun-drenched meadows, whispering forests, and crumbling ruins as you uncover the secrets of a place untouched by time.

There are no enemies. No quests. No urgency.
Just you, the valley, and the slow, immersive art of exploring.

Key Features:

Explore a hand-crafted valley filled with picturesque trails, hidden groves, old cabins, and forgotten paths.

Ambient Storytelling
Discover subtle environmental clues that piece together the valley’s past.

An Evocative Soundscape
Let a gentle, atmospheric soundtrack and immersive nature sounds guide your journey. Headphones recommended.
70010000102367.name: Sunberry Valley

70070000026797.description:
Remember the good old game of hide and seek? Prepare for something a little more extreme!

Features:
- Wear 8 new spooky skins!
- Make friends with 4 new pets!
- Get 5000 extra coins!
- Hide and run away from the seekers
- Find and capture all the hiders
- Enjoy multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
- Use powerups to gain an advantage
- Collect coins to buy skins and pets!

Dive into classic gameplay where you can hide or seek. Count down before setting off to find the Hiders, or blend into the environment, stay silent, and outsmart the Seeker to win!

Simple, fun, and dynamic—Hide 'N Seek brings the joy of this beloved childhood game to life!
70070000026797.intro: ...8, 9, 10. Ready or not, here I come!
70070000026797.name: Hide 'N Seek!: Scary Edition

70070000029587.description:
Take control of a brave little animal and uncover the adorable world hidden beneath the surface! 

Features:
• New Unique Levels - Complete 120 stages with 3 difficulty options each!
• Co-op Fun – Join forces with friends or family in local multiplayer!
• Tricky Enemies – Watch out for baddies that try to cut your line!
• More Custom Looks – Choose your favorite from 27 playful animal avatars!
• 2 additional mechanics: ice and water current
• New enemies and challenges to face!
• Cute Pictures – Reveal a new animal picture in every level—can you find them all?

As you move, you draw a line behind you—close the shape to reveal a piece of the cute picture underneath. From fluffy kittens to curious piglets, each level holds a surprise waiting to be uncovered.

Be careful! Flying foes and sneaky bugs are ready to interrupt your progress. If they hit your line before you close it, you’ll lose a life! Outsmart them with clever tricks like screen-edge teleporting and speed boosts to stay in the game!

Play solo or team up with a friend in co-op mode to uncover the hidden image together!

Draw, dodge, and discover!
70070000029587.intro: Draw a line to enclose the area and uncover the image underneath. Watch out for enemies who can catch you or cut your line!
70070000029587.name: Pet Show: Complete Edition

70070000029573.description:
The world is overrun by terrifying creatures, and only the toughest will make it out alive! Battle endless waves of monsters, face massive bosses, and upgrade your survivors to become unstoppable.

Features:
- new survivor: Rootsy!
- 150 crystals to promote your survivors
- 5000 coins for chests and upgrades
- Non-Stop Action: Fight endless waves of monsters and test your survival skills
- Epic Boss Battles: Take on giant beasts and earn powerful rewards
- Survivor Upgrades: Unlock skills and level up your characters
- Ever-Changing Gameplay: No two runs are the same!
- Immersive Experience: Stunning visuals and intense sound effects

Every run is a new challenge! Improve your stats, unleash devastating abilities, and buy epic artifacts as you carve your path through the apocalypse. 

How long can you last before the monsters overwhelm you?
70070000029573.intro: Survive, adapt, and conquer in a world overrun by monstrous creatures!
70070000029573.name: Monster Survivors: Rootsy Edition
ratingContent: Compras dentro del juego (Incluye artículos aleatorios)

70070000029579.description:
West Escape throws you into a chaotic frontier where the law is on your tail and alien invaders are wreaking havoc. As a fugitive desperate to reunite with your lost love, you'll need to collect scrap, upgrade your gear, and face off against relentless extraterrestrial threats.

Features:
- Premium Equipment: Equip Silver Coin for X2 expedition loot!
- Rare Gear and more: Obtain rare and uncommon Gambler equipment to boost your power level!
- Bonus currency: Additional 500 gems for faster progress!
- High-Energy Combat: Dodge enemy attacks and blast aliens with powerful weapons like revolvers and shotguns.
- Gear Upgrades: Collect scrap and loot to upgrade weapons and gear, boosting stats like speed and damage.
- Explosive Expeditions: Venture into dangerous areas to uncover new gear, resources, and challenges.
- Wild West Meets Sci-Fi: Experience a unique fusion of classic Western adventure and alien invasion chaos.
- Fast-Paced Progression: Keep moving forward with nonstop action, upgrades, and intense encounters.

Fast-paced combat keeps you on your toes—dodge deadly attacks and strike back with revolvers, shotguns, and more. Every battle and upgrade brings you one step closer to freedom and the ultimate showdown in this explosive mix of Wild West grit and sci-fi action.

Saddle up, lock and load—freedom and love are waiting on the other side of this alien-infested frontier!
70070000029579.intro: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the wildest ride through the Wild West!
70070000029579.name: West Escape: Gambler Edition

70070000028020.description:
Whether you're a seasoned sleuth, a trailblazing tactician, or a curious newcomer, the Explorers Collection is your passport to discovery.

Uncover mysteries across continents and brave the wild frontier in this premium bundle celebrating two of gaming's most iconic adventures. 

For a generation of gamers, Carmen Sandiego and The Oregon Trail™ weren't just lessons, they were legends. From school computer labs to living room PCs, these global phenomenas sparked curiosity, shaped childhoods, and defined what it meant to learn through play. Now reimagined, they return for those who grew up with them and for the next generation ready to explore, survive, and discover.

THE OREGON TRAIL - Every choice matters. Every journey is your own. 

A modern reimagining of the road to Oregon, this official successor to the iconic classic will fully immerse you in epic journeys ranging from the historically accurate to the totally extreme. Surviving blizzards, broken limbs, snakebites, exhaustion, starvation, and the dreaded dysentery is no small feat; all the while navigating an untamed frontier to get your party to their new life in Oregon before the winter. 

- Forge your path westward in a bold reimagining of the classroom classic -- complete with historical depth, strategic gameplay, and that famously fatal dysentery.

- Overcome hundreds of random events where your choices affect the fate of your travelers, and are influenced by their unique skills and traits.

- Remember to take care of your party, wagon, and oxen, or they'll become casualties of the trail.

CARMEN SANDIEGO - It takes a thief to catch a thief. 

VILE is back on the scene, and for once, ACME and Carmen Sandiego have a common enemy. In a rare and temporary alliance, the world's greatest thief must track down the syndicate before they can pull off their next big heist.  

Use spy tools such as gliders, grappling hooks, and thermal vision to solve crimes across global 
landmarks, outwit VILE operatives, and explore geography, culture, and critical thinking through stylish, story-driven gameplay. 

From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world's most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.

Made for Curious Minds!

This isn't homework, it's hands-on history. These games are trusted by educators and built to sharpen thinking, empathy, and curiosity in players of all ages.
•Designed for clever kids, nostalgic grown-ups, and lifelong learners
•Features classroom-ready extras and family-friendly support
•A perfect blend of play, purpose, and pixel-powered discovery
70070000028020.intro: Two Timeless Adventures. One Epic Journey of Wits and Survival.
70070000028020.name: Explorers Collection: The Oregon Trail & Carmen Sandiego Bundle
ratingContent: Referencias al Uso de Alcohol y Tabaco

70010000076839.description:
From the creative studio, Wētā Workshop, live the cosy life of a Hobbit in the wonderfully serene landscape of the Shire. Discover, decorate, and share in this idyllic corner of Middle-earth. Join friendly Hobbits and familiar faces awaiting your arrival in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings™ Game. 

Create your own Hobbit as you set forth in Bywater. Though not yet established as an official village in Hobbiton, play a part in helping the quaint town flourish. Greet comfort at the door as you decorate your own Hobbit hole, tend to your garden, fish at the clear ponds, forage wild fruits and herbs, or trade with townsfolks. Prepare homemade meals to share with fellow Hobbits and foster relationships.

With much to see and lots more to eat, enjoy days of splendor in the picturesque forests, lakes, and pastures. 

Unwind in the place where what matters most are all the little things. Help bring the community together to achieve village status in Bywater. Experience delight in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings™ Game.  


Key Features:

Welcome Home, Hobbit – Play as a Hobbit, directly out of J.R.R Tolkien's beloved books! Personalise your appearance and brandish your best Hobbit attire with an array of customisations. Decorate your own Hobbit home and transform the cosy space with grid-free placement to position furniture home décor to your liking. Discover the wonders each new day brings to Bywater as you settle into your serene homestead for much needed rest.

Food Is Love –  No Hobbit’s day is complete without food. Fish, garden, and forage to stock up the pantry with the fruits of your labour. Harvest for seasonal crops and flowers as time passes in your homestead. Enjoy the warmth of the kitchen and show off your culinary chops with recipes for mealtimes. Partake in second breakfast or host a dinner party with fellow Hobbits. Share meals with invited guests to create new relationships. 

Explore Bywater – Explore the outdoors to discover secret glades and lost treasures of the Shire. Experience the ever-changing weather that affect daily routines and seasonal surprises based on time of year. Gain rewards through your story progression. Meet iconic characters and familiar Hobbit families to trade for upgrades to skills, clothes, home, and more. Join club missions to complete daily activities and help gain official village status in Bywater.
70010000076839.name: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of The Rings™ Game

70010000093204.description:
What is MADO MONOGATARI?
MADO MONOGATARI began as a series of primarily first-person dungeon-crawler RPGs created by Compile for the MSX and PC-98 during the 80's and 90's. Since then, MADO MONOGATARI has made a name for itself with its unforgettable characters and dungeon-crawling gameplay. Notably, the renowned puzzle series Puyo Puyo is a spinoff of the MADO MONOGATARI series.

MADO MONOGATARI: Fia and the Wondrous Academy Story
The Ancient Magic Academy.

An academy with a long, storied past, known as the place where The Great Mage learned and graduated. Students study here to become Mages themselves.

A girl named Fia, wanting to enroll in the Academy, makes a long arduous journey from her hometown, and manages to get in through her own luck.

She now tries her best to get through the many challenges of schoolwork, strict professors, and mysterious happenings, all in pursuit of her goal to become a Great Mage herself, while also making friends with other students in her class.

Embark on an adventure with Fia and her classmates as they explore the mysteries of the Ancient Magic Academy and uncover the legends of The Great Mage.

Key Features
Conquer Dynamic Dungeons and Help Fia Become A Great Mage! — Crawl through randomly generated dungeons and engage in real-time, turn-based battles to help Fia level up. Use Magic Artes and collect Elemental Orbs to fill up your gauge and unleash Great Magic Artes. Manage your inventory and stats as you traverse floor after floor of wondrous treasures and magical monsters—including Puyo, Skeleton T, and others!

Keep your Grimoire Handy! — Keep track of unlocked abilities with the Grimoire, which logs Fia's Magic Artes. Complete Assignments, Help Quests, and earn Learning Points that can be used to unlock nodes in the Grimoire for Fia to learn new Magic Artes. 

Fia is Mad About Town! — Take a break from dungeon crawling and explore the school grounds where Fia can check out the Bulletin Board for unlocked mini-games, interact with classmates, grow ingredients, cook curry for in-dungeon boosts, and more! Find out what other goings on await Fia along her journey!

Swords, Shields, and Shiny Armor with Synthesis in the Storage Room — In the Storage Room of the school grounds, use items found in dungeons to synthesize into new equipment for Fia. Better synthesis items can later be unlocked via the Grimoire.
70010000093204.intro: Enroll in the Ancient Magic Academy and become a Great Mage!
70010000093204.name: MADO MONOGATARI: Fia and the Wondrous Academy

70010000093315.description: Snag the Digital Art Book to study up on The Ancient Magic Academy with design sketches, character portraits, a gallery of CGs, and even an enchanting short story to boot! A total of 64 pages make this Digital Art Book almost as valuable as your Grimoire.
70010000093315.name: MADO MONOGATARI: Fia and the Wondrous Academy Digital Art Book

70010000093316.description:
Need a bit of wonder in your school life? This Digital Soundtrack has got you covered with 27 whimsical tunes to study to!

Tracklist:
・ASOVENTURE (Game Ver.)
・Magic Artes Exam Theme
・Ancient Magic Academy Theme

・Skull Prison Theme
